verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Wakristu wote tusimame,
tutangaze,
injili yake Bwana Wetu
iende mbele. x2
Iende wapi, Injili, Iende mbele
injili yake injili,
iende mbele.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Akina Mama tusimame,
tutangaze,
injili yake Bwana Wetu
iende mbele. x2
Iende wapi, Injili, Iende mbele
injili yake injili,
iende mbele.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Akina Baba tusimame,
tutangaze,
injili yake Bwana Wetu
iende mbele. x2
Iende wapi, Injili, Iende mbele
injili yake injili,
iende mbele.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Vijana wote tusimame,
tutangaze,
injili yake Bwana Wetu
iende mbele. x2
Iende wapi, Injili, Iende mbele
injili yake injili,
iende mbele.
